content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
-  Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
-  Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
-  Assembling machine (position z1)
-  Furnace (position y1)
-  Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors related to crafting machines
- Verify that the required crafting machines or furnaces are available and properly set up to produce the desired items.
